title: 🇺🇸 Trump Intel — Feb 21 2026 10:06 AM
content:
# 🇺🇸 Trump Intel Scanner — Saturday, February 21, 2026 — 10:06 AM EST

## 🔴 CRITICAL ALERTS

TRUMP|🔴|trade|Supreme Court Strikes Down Trump Emergency Tariffs|SCOTUS rules 6-3 that Trump exceeded authority using emergency powers for sweeping tariffs under IEEPA. Major legal defeat for "Liberation Day" tariff policy. $175B in tariff collections subject to potential refunds.|https://www.reuters.com/world/us/

TRUMP|🔴|trade|Trump Announces 10% Global Tariff After SCOTUS Defeat|President signs off on new 10% "global tariff" immediately after Supreme Court rejects his emergency tariff authority, vowing to achieve "same tariff level" through alternative legal mechanisms.|https://www.foxnews.com/politics/trump-responds-supreme-court-ruling-rejecting-sweeping-tariffs-powers-disgrace

TRUMP|🔴|military|Trump Weighs Iran Strike Decision as Israelis Prepare|Fox reports Israelis "keep suitcases packed" as Trump weighs potential military strike on Iran. Rising tensions in Persian Gulf with citizens preparing for possible retaliation.|https://www.foxnews.com/world/israelis-keep-suitcases-packed-ready-trump-weighs-potential-iran-strike-decision

## 🟠 IMPORTANT ALERTS

TRUMP|🟠|trade|Treasury Secretary: SCOTUS Ruling "Strengthened Trump"|Scott Bessent tells media Supreme Court's "draconian" move paradoxically strengthened Trump's hand, pledges administration will return to "same tariff level" via alternative laws (Section 232, 301, etc).|https://www.foxnews.com/media/scott-bessent-says-supreme-court-strengthened-trump-draconian-move-despite-ruling-tariffs

TRUMP|🟠|trade|$175 Billion in Tariff Refunds Possible After Ruling|Penn-Wharton Budget Model economists estimate over $175B in U.S. tariff collections subject to potential refunds following Supreme Court decision striking down emergency tariffs.|https://www.reuters.com/world/us/

TRUMP|🟠|policy|Trump Administration Announces $12B Farm Subsidies|USDA prepares to distribute $12 billion in government subsidies to farmers next week as agency officials defend assistance as necessary to prevent financial ruin.|https://www.reuters.com/world/us/

TRUMP|🟠|policy|EPA Scraps Biden Coal Restrictions Under Trump Order|EPA Administrator Lee Zeldin reverses Biden-era mercury standards for coal plants, sparking praise from energy advocates for struggling coal communities. Major regulatory rollback.|https://www.foxnews.com/politics/epa-scraps-biden-coal-restrictions-advocates-say-move-restore-american-dominance

TRUMP|🟠|policy|CIA Retracts 19 Intelligence Assessments for Political Bias|CIA retracting and revising 19 past intelligence reports (mostly DEI-related) after internal review found political bias under previous administration. Major intelligence policy shift.|https://www.foxnews.com/politics/cia-retracts-revises-19-past-intelligence-assessments-deemed-politically-biased

## 🟡 NOTABLE ALERTS

TRUMP|🟡|political|Republicans Quietly Celebrate Tariff Ruling|Some GOP members privately relieved by SCOTUS ruling blocking tariffs, with sources saying "Tariffs suck" - revealing internal party divisions on Trump's trade policy.|https://www.foxnews.com/politics/tariffs-suck-some-republicans-privately-celebrate-supreme-court-blocks-trump-policy

TRUMP|🟡|political|Democrats Cheer Supreme Court Tariff Decision|House Minority Leader Hakeem Jeffries and Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer lead Democrats in praising SCOTUS for striking down Trump tariff authority, despite past Democratic support for trade duties.|https://www.foxnews.com/politics/democrats-cheer-supreme-court-move-blocking-trump-tariffs-despite-past-support-trade-duties

TRUMP|🟡|political|Trump Criticizes Supreme Court Justices After Ruling|President Trump slams Supreme Court justices following tariff ruling, calling decision a "disgrace" while simultaneously announcing new 10% global tariff under different legal authority.|https://www.foxnews.com/politics/trump-responds-supreme-court-ruling-rejecting-sweeping-tariffs-powers-disgrace
